statements: UPDATE RestaurantOrders SET total_amount = total_amount + 50 WHERE order_id = 123;
UPDATE RestaurantOrders SET status = 'Completed' WHERE order_id = 456;
UPDATE RestaurantOrders SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1 WHERE order_id = 789;
UPDATE RestaurantOrders SET total_amount = total_amount + 10 WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE RestaurantOrders SET status = 'Delivered' WHERE customer_id = 200 AND total_amount > 50;
UPDATE RestaurantOrders SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1, status = 'Pending' WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Processing';
UPDATE Restaurants SET address='123 Main Street' WHERE restaurant_id=1;
UPDATE Orders SET customer_name='John Doe' WHERE order_id=101;
UPDATE Restaurants SET restaurant_name='ABC Restaurant' WHERE restaurant_id=2;
UPDATE Restaurants SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE restaurant_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET order_total = 50.00 WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE Restaurants SET address = '456 Elm St', restaurant_name = 'New Name' WHERE restaurant_id = 2;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 1000 WHERE order_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Ingredients SET quantity = 50 WHERE ingredient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE OrderItems SET quantity = 2 WHERE order_item_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1 WHERE order_date <= '2021-10-31';
UPDATE OrderItems JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id SET OrderItems.quantity = OrderItems.quantity - Ingredients.quantity WHERE Ingredients.quantity > 0;

UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = (SELECT SUM(Ingredients.quantity) FROM OrderItems JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id);
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'New Customer Name' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 1000.50 WHERE order_id = 1;
UPDATE Ingredients SET quantity_in_stock = 50 WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'New Customer Name' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = total_amount + 50 WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE Ingredients SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 10 WHERE ingredient_id = 201;
UPDATE Customers SET phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount=150.00 WHERE order_id=101;
UPDATE Menu SET price=7.99 WHERE item_id=201;
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = total_amount + 50 WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Menu SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_name = 'Pizza';
